scripts.dev: concurrently "cross-env PORT=1 nodemon server.js" "cd client && live-se500rver --port=3000 --host=localhost --no-browser"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "cross-env PORT=5001 nodemon server.js" "cd client && live-server --port=3000 --host=localhost"
